title.narrative: Consortium for Elections and Political Process Strengthening (CEPPS); Sudan Political Party Development Program
Consorcio para Elecciones y Fortalecimiento de Procesos Políticos (CEPPS); Programa de desarrollo de partidos políticos de Sudán

description.narrative: The program is to provide technical and training support to promote participatory and legitimate political process in Sudan through political party development and legislative strengthening. Activities aim to promote the establishment and/or development of institutions which will ensure a viable peace at national, regional, and local level.

El programa tiene como objetivo brindar apoyo técnico y de capacitación para promover procesos políticos participativos y legítimos en Sudán a través del desarrollo de partidos políticos y el fortalecimiento legislativo. Las actividades tienen como objetivo promover el establecimiento y/o desarrollo de instituciones que garanticen una paz viable a nivel nacional, regional y local.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Assistance for the Independent States of the Former Soviet Union

title.narrative: HED Partnership: Strengthening Rural Agriculture Development

description.narrative: Ngozi University/South Carolina State University: Strengthening Rural Agriculture Development - The partnership has enhanced Ngozi University (NU) faculty pedagogical skills, revised the curriculum in agriculture and enhanced faculty research capacity. The partners established experimental research stations that increased NUs outreach capacity by providing extension services to local farmers and communities, producing and disseminating newly tested seeds for rice, fruits, and vegetables. These activities support improved nutrition, food security, and overall quality of life of the local farming communities. The partners are training trainers to enhance the skills of the extension agents who work with farmers, including a number of women farmers.

description.narrative: This award is for a direct administrative costs or operating expenses of the U.S. Agency for International Development.

Improve the capacity of businesses to integrate into domestic and international markets through increases in productivity and improvements in corporate governance and the development and application of modern technology and marketing practices. Enhance the capacity of businesses and business associations in terms of their corporate governance capabilities and their application of best practices and technologies to achieve increased production and marketing of products and services. It includes adoption of efficient production processes, improved labor productivity, environmentally-sound management of natural resources and the development of accounting and management systems that can help the company and industry group implement business, labor, product and process standards that enhance business competitiveness. Business capacity development programs may include activities that help men- and women-owned firms and associations respond to these international markets and create regional alliances.

description.narrative: Increase the availability and use of proven life-saving interventions that address the major killers of mothers and children and improve their health and nutrition status, including effective maternity care and management of obstetric complications; prevention services including newborn care, routine immunization, polio eradication, safe water and hygiene, and micronutrients; improved maternal, infant and young child feeding; and treatment of life-threatening childhood illnesses.

Aumentar a disponibilidade e a utilização de intervenções comprovadamente salvadoras de vidas que abordem as principais causas de morte de mães e crianças e melhorem o seu estado de saúde e nutrição, incluindo cuidados de maternidade eficazes e gestão de complicações obstétricas; serviços de prevenção, incluindo cuidados neonatais, imunização de rotina, erradicação da poliomielite, água potável e higiene, e micronutrientes; melhoria da alimentação materna, infantil e infantil; e tratamento de doenças infantis potencialmente fatais.

Accroître la disponibilité et l'utilisation d'interventions vitales éprouvées qui s'attaquent aux principales causes de mortalité maternelle et infantile et améliorent leur état de santé et leur nutrition, y compris des soins de maternité efficaces et la gestion des complications obstétricales ; les services de prévention, notamment les soins néonatals, la vaccination systématique, l'éradication de la poliomyélite, l'eau potable et l'hygiène, ainsi que les micronutriments ; une meilleure alimentation de la mère, du nourrisson et du jeune enfant ; et le traitement des maladies infantiles potentiellement mortelles.

title.narrative: U.S. Census Bureau Participating Agency Program Agreement (PAPA)
Acordo do Programa de Agência Participante do Census Bureau dos EUA (PAPA)
Accord de programme d'agence participante au Bureau du recensement des États-Unis (PAPA)

description.narrative: Since 1988, the U.S. Census Bureau has worked with USAIDs Bureau for Global Health to enhance the quantity, quality, and utility of HIV/AIDS-related data. These data are used for policy development, program formulation, and monitoring and evaluation, and form anintegral part of USAIDs work in combating HIV/AIDS. Applying its extensive experience in epidemiological data base projections and population projection modeling, the Census Bureau has contributed to the USAID program with support in monitoring the spread of HIV and in understanding the effect the AIDS pandemic has on development.

Desde 1988, o Gabinete do Censo dos EUA tem trabalhado com o Gabinete para a Saúde Global da USAID para melhorar a quantidade, a qualidade e a utilidade dos dados relacionados com o VIH/SIDA. Estes dados são utilizados para o desenvolvimento de políticas, formulação de programas, monitorização e avaliação, e constituem parte integrante do trabalho da USAID no combate ao VIH/SIDA. Aplicando a sua vasta experiência em projecções de bases de dados epidemiológicos e modelização de projecções populacionais, o Gabinete do Censo contribuiu para o programa da USAID com apoio na monitorização da propagação do VIH e na compreensão do efeito que a pandemia da SIDA tem no desenvolvimento.

Depuis 1988, le Bureau du recensement des États-Unis travaille avec le Bureau de la santé mondiale de l'USAID pour améliorer la quantité, la qualité et l'utilité des données liées au VIH/SIDA. Ces données sont utilisées pour l'élaboration de politiques, la formulation de programmes, ainsi que le suivi et l'évaluation, et font partie intégrante du travail de l'USAID dans la lutte contre le VIH/SIDA. Fort de sa vaste expérience en matière de projections de bases de données épidémiologiques et de modélisation de projections démographiques, le Bureau du recensement a contribué au programme de l'USAID en aidant à surveiller la propagation du VIH et à comprendre l'effet de la pandémie de SIDA sur le développement.

description.narrative: An innovative global initiative funded by the United States Agency for International Development (USAID), the Capacity Project strengthened human resources to implement quality health programming in developing countries, focusing on: 1) Improving workforce planning and leadership to ensure that the right type and number of health workers are deployed to the right locations; 2) Developing better education and training programs so that health workers have the knowledge and skills to meet the needs of their communities; and 3) Strengthening systems to support workforce performance and encourage workers to remain on the job.

title.narrative: Food and Nutrition Technical Assistance II (FANTA II)
Assistência Técnica Alimentar e Nutricional II (FANTA II)

description.narrative: The Food and Nutrition Technical Assistance Project (FANTA) has been working to improve the health and well-being of vulnerable individuals, families, and communities in developing countries by strengthening food security and nutrition policies, programs, and systems. The project provides comprehensive technical support to USAID and its partners, including host country governments, international organizations, and nongovernmental organizations. FANTA works at both the country and global levels, supporting the design and implementation of programs in focus countries, and building on field experience to strengthen the evidence base, methods, and global standards for food security and nutrition programming.

O Projecto de Assistência Técnica Alimentar e Nutricional (FANTA) tem trabalhado para melhorar a saúde e o bem-estar de indivíduos, famílias e comunidades vulneráveis ​​nos países em desenvolvimento, reforçando as políticas, programas e sistemas de segurança alimentar e nutricional. O projecto fornece apoio técnico abrangente à USAID e aos seus parceiros, incluindo governos dos países anfitriões, organizações internacionais e organizações não-governamentais. A FANTA trabalha tanto a nível nacional como global, apoiando a concepção e implementação de programas nos países em foco e aproveitando a experiência no terreno para fortalecer a base de evidências, métodos e padrões globais para a programação de segurança alimentar e nutrição.
the main project providing assistance in contraceptive logistics, including the integration of products into essential drugs and medical supplies.
le principal projet fournit une assistance en matière de logistique contraceptive, y compris l'intégration de produits dans les médicaments essentiels et les fournitures médicales.

description.narrative: Supports the following illustrative program-funded costs: salaries of US, FSN, and TCN and other staff such as PSCs, RSSAs, PASAs, CASUs working for the US Government managing, administering, and supporting programs and their program-funded benefits such as housing, travel, transportation, education allowances etc; institutional contractors that provide such staff, rent, IT services, the program-funded share of utilities, staff training costs and the cost of developing and administering training programs, equipment and supplies, ICASS, vehicle fuel and maintenance, maintenance contracts, janitorial services, operational unit web page development and maintenance, outreach such as publications and the cost of their preparation (including staff costs), and technical assistance to ensure USG compliance with regulations.

Apoia os seguintes custos ilustrativos financiados pelo programa: salários dos EUA, FSN e TCN e outros funcionários, como PSCs, RSSAs, PASAs, CASUs que trabalham para o governo dos EUA, gerenciando, administrando e apoiando programas e seus benefícios financiados pelo programa, como habitação , viagens, transporte, subsídios de educação, etc; contratantes institucionais que fornecem esse pessoal, aluguel, serviços de TI, a parcela de serviços públicos financiada pelo programa, custos de treinamento de pessoal e o custo de desenvolvimento e administração de programas de treinamento, equipamentos e suprimentos, ICASS, combustível e manutenção de veículos, contratos de manutenção, serviços de zeladoria, desenvolvimento e manutenção da página web da unidade operacional, divulgação, como publicações e o custo da sua preparação (incluindo custos de pessoal), e assistência técnica para garantir a conformidade do Governo dos EUA com os regulamentos.

description.narrative: Support the creation, improvement and sustainability of physical infrastructure, and related services, in both urban and rural areas, to enhance the economic environment and improve economic productivity, including for women. The main infrastructures include energy, including electric power transmission lines and distribution networks, oil/gas terminals, refineries, storage facilities and pipelines; telecom and ICT; and transport, including roads, airports, railways, and ports. Water and sanitation services are included under the Investing in People, Health area.

description.narrative: Strengthen the legal, regulatory, institutional, and information environment which protects and enables the growth in associational life and the development of independent and sustainable civil society organizations (CSOs). Build the capacity of civil society organizations to act as agents for reform and support their participation in democratic decision-making through articulating and representing their members interests, engaging in service delivery, and advocating for issues which become part of the public agenda and are reflected in public policies. Encourage the strengthening of a civic culture which supports democratic institutions and processes, active participation in political and civic life, and the civic virtues of tolerance, pluralism, compromise, trust, and respect for individual rights, including gender equality.

Fortalecer el entorno legal, regulatorio, institucional y de información que proteja y posibilite el crecimiento de la vida asociativa y el desarrollo de organizaciones de la sociedad civil (OSC) independientes y sostenibles. Desarrollar la capacidad de las organizaciones de la sociedad civil para actuar como agentes de reforma y apoyar su participación en la toma de decisiones democráticas mediante la articulación y representación de los intereses de sus miembros, la participación en la prestación de servicios y la promoción de cuestiones que pasan a formar parte de la agenda pública y se reflejan en políticas públicas. Fomentar el fortalecimiento de una cultura cívica que apoye las instituciones y los procesos democráticos, la participación activa en la vida política y cívica y las virtudes cívicas de la tolerancia, el pluralismo, el compromiso, la confianza y el respeto por los derechos individuales, incluida la igualdad de género.

description.narrative: Supports the following illustrative program-funded costs: salaries of US, FSN, and TCN and other staff such as PSCs, RSSAs, PASAs, CASUs working for the US Government managing, administering, and supporting programs and their program-funded benefits such as housing, travel, transportation, education allowances etc; institutional contractors that provide such staff, rent, IT services, the program-funded share of utilities, staff training costs and the cost of developing and administering training programs, equipment and supplies, ICASS, vehicle fuel and maintenance, maintenance contracts, janitorial services, operational unit web page development and maintenance, outreach such as publications and the cost of their preparation (including staff costs), and technical assistance to ensure USG compliance with regulations.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: Child Survival and Health Programs Fund, United States

description.narrative: Increase the availability and use of proven life-saving interventions that address the major killers of mothers and children and improve their health and nutrition status, including effective maternity care and management of obstetric complications; prevention services including newborn care, routine immunization, polio eradication, safe water and hygiene, and micronutrients; improved maternal, infant and young child feeding; and treatment of life-threatening childhood illnesses.

Accroître la disponibilité et l'utilisation d'interventions vitales éprouvées qui s'attaquent aux principales causes de mortalité maternelle et infantile et améliorent leur état de santé et leur nutrition, y compris des soins de maternité efficaces et la gestion des complications obstétricales ; les services de prévention, notamment les soins néonatals, la vaccination systématique, l'éradication de la poliomyélite, l'eau potable et l'hygiène, ainsi que les micronutriments ; une meilleure alimentation de la mère, du nourrisson et du jeune enfant ; et le traitement des maladies infantiles potentiellement mortelles.

title.narrative: Assistance en cas de crise et redressement

description.narrative: Provide goods, personnel, services and assistance to meet basic human needs in order to foster transition from relief according to principles of universality, impartiality and human dignity. This element should be done, when possible, as part of an integrated, coordinated and/or multi-sectoral approach.

Proporcionar bienes, personal, servicios y asistencia para satisfacer las necesidades humanas básicas con el fin de fomentar la transición del socorro de acuerdo con los principios de universalidad, imparcialidad y dignidad humana. Este elemento debería realizarse, cuando sea posible, como parte de un enfoque integrado, coordinado y/o multisectorial.

Fournir des biens, du personnel, des services et une assistance pour répondre aux besoins humains fondamentaux afin de favoriser la transition après les secours selon les principes d'universalité, d'impartialité et de dignité humaine. Cet élément doit être réalisé, lorsque cela est possible, dans le cadre d'une approche intégrée, coordonnée et/ou multisectorielle.
